Package ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardView
    Board GUI design.
    ButtonsView
    Buttons GUI design.
    CLIView
    Command line panel GUI design.
    CommandHistoryView
    Command history GUI design.
    CommandInputView
    Command input text field GUI design.
    FrameView
    Frame GUI design.
    GameView
    Integrate Board, CLI and Options into a single window.
    OptionsView
    Contains the player's frame, displays each player's score and has buttons for help, pass, challenge, quit, restart, switch theme.
    PopupView
    Pop-up window on button click.
    ScoreView
    Score display GUI design.
    TileView
    Filled Tile GUI design.
